metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26797 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Mediainfo before version 20.08 has a heap buffer overflow vulnerability via MediaInfoLib::File_Gxf::ChooseParser_ChannelGrouping.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmediainfo0v5 - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
python-mediainfodll - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
python3-mediainfodll - 17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1').
